treatments.title: Neuromuscular Disorders
treatments.description: Comprehensive treatment for neuromuscular conditions affecting muscles and nerves
treatments.detailedDescription: Neuromuscular disorders are a group of conditions that affect the muscles and the nerves that control them. These disorders can cause muscle weakness, pain, and other symptoms that can significantly impact daily life.
prevention: Early detection and treatment of underlying conditions

treatments.title: Peripheral Neuropathy
treatments.description: Specialized care for nerve damage affecting the peripheral nervous system
treatments.detailedDescription: Peripheral neuropathy occurs when nerves outside the brain and spinal cord are damaged. This can cause pain, numbness, and weakness, typically in the hands and feet.
symptoms: Numbness or tingling in hands and feet
Changes in skin, hair, or nails
prevention: Maintaining good blood sugar control if diabetic
Eating a balanced diet rich in B vitamins
whenToSeeDoctor: Severe pain that interferes with daily activities
Signs of infection in affected areas
Changes in bowel or bladder function

treatments.title: Stroke
treatments.description: Emergency and rehabilitation care for stroke patients
treatments.detailedDescription: A stroke occurs when blood flow to part of the brain is interrupted, causing brain cells to die. Prompt treatment is crucial for recovery and minimizing long-term effects.
symptoms: Sudden numbness or weakness in face, arm, or leg
Trouble seeing in one or both eyes
Trouble walking, dizziness, or loss of balance
Severe headache with no known cause
treatments: Support for speech and mobility recovery
prevention: Healthy diet low in sodium and saturated fats
whenToSeeDoctor: Any signs of stroke (call emergency services immediately)
